admin_templates.template:
{xen:phrase miu_configuration_buttons_list} {xen:phrase miu_configuration} {xen:phrase miu_configuration_import_button} {xen:phrase miu_configuration_add_button}

{xen:phrase miu_configuration_miubuttons}

    {xen:phrase delete} {xen:phrase edit} {xen:phrase export}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $codes}', 'total={xen:count $codes}'}

{xen:phrase miu_configuration_no_button}
{xen:phrase miu_configuration_exportall} {xen:phrase miu_configuration_importall}

{xen:phrase miu_configuration_delelete_confirmation_title} {$code.button_code} ? {xen:phrase miu_configuration_delelete_confirmation} {xen:phrase miu_configuration_delelete_confirmation} {$code.title}

{xen:phrase miu_configuration_delelete_confirmation_question}

{$code.button_code} ?

<xen:title>{xen:if '{$code.miu_button_id}', '{xen:phrase miu_configuration_edition} {$code.button_code}', '{xen:phrase miu_configuration_addbutton}'}</xen:title> <xen:require css="markitup_button_edit.css" />
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink markitup-editor}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration}</xen:breadcrumb> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink markitup-editor/buttonslist}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration_buttons_list}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'markitup-editor/save', $code}" method="post" class="AutoValidator">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonCode_Label}" name="button_code" value="{$code.button_code}" explain="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonCode_Desc}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonCommand_Label}" name="button_cmd" value="{$code.button_cmd}" rows="7" inputclass="Elastic" explain="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonCommand_Desc}" />
<fieldset> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonMainCSS_Label}" name="button_maincss" value="{$code.button_maincss}" rows="5" inputclass="Elastic" explain="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonMainCSS_Desc}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonExtraCSS_Label}" name="button_extracss" value="{$code.button_extracss}" rows="7" inputclass="Elastic" explain="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_ButtonExtraCSS_Desc}" /> </fieldset>
<fieldset> <xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="button_has_usr" selected="{$code.button_has_usr}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration_usergroups_activation}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_usergroups_list_question}"> <xen:foreach loop="$code.usr_list" value="$list"> <xen:option name="button_usr[{$list.value}]" selected="{$list.selected}">{$list.label}</xen:option> </xen:foreach> </xen:checkboxunit> </fieldset>
<xen:submitunit> <input type="submit" name="reload" value="{xen:phrase save}" accesskey="s" {xen:if '{$code.miu_button_id}', 'class="button primary"', 'style="display:none"'} id="saveReloadButton" /> <xen:if is="!{$code.langdir}"> <input type="submit" name="saveexit" value="{xen:phrase save_and_exit}" accesskey="e" class="button OverlayTrigger" id="saveExitButton" /> </xen:if> <input type="button" name="delete" value="{xen:phrase delete}" accesskey="d" class="button OverlayTrigger" data-href="{xen:adminlink 'markitup-editor/delete', $code}" id="deleteButton" {xen:if '!{$code.miu_button_id}', 'style="display: none"'}
/> <input type="hidden" name="miu_button_id" value="{$code.miu_button_id}" /> <input type="hidden" name="miu_lang_dir" value="{$code.langdir}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </xen:submitunit> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase miu_configuration_import_button_title}</xen:title>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'markitup-editor/import'}" upload="true"> <xen:uploadunit label="{xen:phrase install_from_uploaded_file}:" name="upload_file" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase install_from_file_on_server}:" name="server_file" />
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_forceupdate}"> <xen:option name="forceupdate" selected="{$code.forceupdate}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration_forceupdate_desc}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_import_button}" /> </xen:form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase miu_configuration_multibuttons_importer}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink markitup-editor}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'markitup-editor/importall'}" upload="true"> <xen:uploadunit label="{xen:phrase install_from_uploaded_file}:" name="upload_file" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase install_from_file_on_server}:" name="server_file" />
<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_forceupdate}"> <xen:option name="forceupdate" selected="{$code.forceupdate}">{xen:phrase miu_configuration_forceupdate_multi_desc}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase miu_configuration_import_buttons}" /> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase miu_configuration_buttons_allimport_results} {xen:phrase miu_configuration}

listener.description: Pre Dispatch Listener: Force membres to use MarkitUp
Templates Listener : Add JS and CSS

phrases.phrase: Yes, I want to force everyone to use the Markitup editor
No, I prefer to give users the choice (recommended)
This Button "Code name" is already used. Please select another "Code name" for tha button.
Button short name. Will appear in the visual configuration.
MarkItUp Button Command. Uses Javascript and its own code. See more here. You can use Xen Code here.
Extra CSS are used if Button is a menu and has options.

CSS for Button Main Icon (parent menu). If you want to use different buttons per language, use this pattern to activate a XenForo Phrase: {phrase:buttonphrase}.

In this phrase, you can put a button name for one language and another name for another language. You must create a XenForo Phrase and chose the following option : "Cache this phrase globally" to prevent to add a query for the phrase.

Same thing for the below extra css.
Are you sure to delete the following button:
You don't have permission to manage the Mark It Up Editor.
Select this option if you want to force and update an existing button
Select this option if you want to update all existing buttons. Do not select this option if you only want to import new buttons from a buttons set.

Another button with a same "Code name" has been found in your database. The importation has been stopped. If you want to replace your existing button, select the "Force Update" option on the previous page.
Buttons which have NOT been updated or created:
Please use only alphanumeric characters (without any space) for the Button "Code name".
The editor can support over than 6 lines, but if you go over that number, you will need to create a new image background.
Which options would you like to configure?
Buttons which have been updated or created:
Click here if you want to activate Usergroups Permissions for this button
This file is a MarkItUp multi buttons xml
This file is a MarkItUp single button xml
This file is not a MarkItUp multi buttons xml
This file is not a MarkItUp single button xml

Use the rich text editor but display bbcode text editor first
Above option must be selected
[Debug] Display ajax response in Visual Management
Only for debug - display buttons list in ajax response
This "developer mode" will use the full source Javascript files
Only for debug - disable css minify in listener
Only for debug - disable Javascript minify in listener
Only for debug - Display what datas are inside the cache (will only display to admin usergroup)
[Debug] TinyMCE Dynamic Load - Stop IE7 error

Due to a problem with relative path, Internet Explorer 7 can't load on demand TinyMCE with XenForo configuration (it still can be solved). "Load on demand" will only occur if you select to display first the MarkItUp editor. To prevent an error, a Javascript alert message will be displayed to the IE7 user.
This Javascript addon will be activated when TinyMCE is not loaded (if TinyMCE is in the background, the XenForo Elastic Plugin will still work). Do you want to disable it? Default value: no.
Do you want to stop the WYSIWYG Editor for every one?
This option will bypass user preferences and will stop TinyMce for everyone.
Do you want to activate the Markitup Integration?
The Button "Code name" field is required. Don't let it blank.
The Button Command field is required. Don't let it blank.
Markitup Xenforo Integration Visual Options For Admin View
Visual options for the MarkItUp Editor
Do you want to apply the automatic gradient on the Editor Container? This gradient will change according to the number of buttons lines. This function supports until 6 lines.
Use this property to set the global visual options for the drop downmenu (background color, corners, etc.)
Select here which should be the height of buttons lines (this property is mainly there to fix a IE7 bug). Default value: 30px.
To use with the smilies button
How many smilies would you like to to display? (Default:12) - A blank value will display them all.
This option will activate the properties of the panel "Editor Textarea - Focus". It will help you for example to disable the yellow background color when typing a text.
These properties will only be active if you have selected to use a customised focus with the Textarea (see the Settings panel above).

property.title: Drop Menu container
property.description: Use this property to set the global visual options for the drop downmenu (background color, corners, etc.)

property.title: MarkItUp Lines Height
property.description: Select here which should be the height of buttons lines (this property is mainly there to fix a IE7 bug). Default value: 30px.

property.title: Editor Container - Automatic Gradient
property.description: Do you want to apply the automatic gradient on the Editor Container? This gradient will change according to the number of buttons lines. This function supports until 6 lines.

property.title: Editor Textarea - Focus
property.description: These properties will only be active if you have selected to use a customised focus with the Textarea (see the Settings panel above).

property.title: Textarea Customised Focus Activation
property.description: This option will activate the properties of the panel "Editor Textarea - Focus". It will help you for example to disable the yellow background color when typing a text.

property.title: Smilies box
property.description: To use with the smilies button

property.title: Smilies number
property.description: How many smilies would you like to to display? (Default:12) - A blank value will display them all.

group.title: Markitup Xenforo Integration (ADMIN VIEW)
group.description: Markitup Xenforo Integration Visual Options For Admin View

group.title: MarkItUp Editor - Public View
group.description: Visual options for the MarkItUp Editor

templates.template:
<xen:hook name="miu_integrator_global"> <xen:if is="{$xenOptions.markitup_integration_debug_devmode}"> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/src/markitup.extra.framework.js" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/src/autosize.js" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/src/jquery.markitup.xen.src.js" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/src/jquery.markitup.bridge.src.js" /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/src/markitup.extra.set.src.js" /> <xen:else /> <xen:require js="js/sedo/markitup/jquery.markitup.all.js" /> </xen:if>
<xen:require css="MarkitUpIntegrator.css" />
<script language="javascript">myBbcodeSettings = { nameSpace: "bbcode", noResize: {$xenOptions.markitup_integration_disable_autosize}, markupSet: [{xen:raw $xenSet}]}</script>
<xen:hook name="miu_integrator_css"> <style type="text/css"> <xen:if is="{xen:property miu_public_container_autogradient}"> .markItUpContainer { background: {xen:property miu_public_container.background-color} url({$stylesPath}/sedo/markitup/editor/bg-container_{$lines_number}.png) repeat-x top left !important; } </xen:if>
{xen:raw $miuCss} </style> </xen:hook> </xen:hook>
<xen:edithint template="MarkitUpIntegrator_Tools" /> <xen:edithint template="MarkitUp_Tools_Color_Picker" /> <xen:edithint template="MarkitUp_Tools_Url" /> <xen:edithint template="MarkitUp_Tools_Img" /> <xen:edithint template="MarkitUp_Tools_Media" />

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Global options
*********************************/</xen:comment>
.markItUp * {
	margin:0px; padding:0px;
	outline:none;
}

.markItUpHeader ul, .markItUpHeader li, .markItUpEditor {
    margin: 0 !important;
}


.markItUp a:link,
.markItUp a:visited {
	color:#000;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.markItUpFooter {
	width:100%;
	cursor:n-resize;
}

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.markitup_integration_disable_autosize}">
.markItUpResizeHandle {
	overflow:hidden;
	width:22px; height:5px;
	margin-left:auto;
	margin-right:auto;
	background-image:url(styles/sedo/markitup/editor/handle.png);
	cursor:n-resize;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:comment>/********************************
*Global Container
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUp  {
		{xen:property miu_public_globalcontainer}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
*Editor Container
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUpContainer  {
		{xen:property miu_public_container}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
*Editor Textarea
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUpEditor {
		{xen:property miu_public_textarea}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
*Editor Textarea Focus
*********************************/</xen:comment>

	<xen:if is="{xen:property miu_public_textarea_focus_activation}">
	.markItUpContainer textarea.textCtrl:focus,
	.markItUpContainer .textCtrl:focus,
	.markItUpContainer .textCtrl.Focus{
		{xen:helper cssImportant,
			{xen:property miu_public_textarea_focus}}
		}
	</xen:if>

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Lines
*********************************/</xen:comment>

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpLine {
		position:relative;
		min-height:{xen:property miu_public_lines_height};
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Buttons parent level
*********************************/</xen:comment>

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent > li {
		list-style:none;
		position:relative;
		margin:0;
		padding:0;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent > li > a
	{
		display: block;
		position: relative;
		left: 0;
		margin: 0 auto;
		top: -1px;
		text-indent: -10000px;
		width: 25px;
		height: 25px;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent > .markItUpButton
	{
		{xen:property miu_public_buttons}
		/*Hack IE7*/
		*display: inline;
		zoom: 1;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent > .markItUpButton.hasMenu
	{
		width: {xen:calc '{xen:property miu_public_buttons_defaultwidth} + {xen:property miu_public_buttons_drop.width}'}px;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent > .markItUpButton:hover
	{
		{xen:property miu_public_buttons_hover}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Buttons child level 1 
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUpHeader .markItUpChild li a {
		display: block;
		position: relative;
		margin-left: auto;
		margin-right: auto;
		left: 0;
		text-indent: -10000px;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpChild li:hover  {
		{xen:property miu_public_dropmenu_hover}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* DropMenu
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUpHeader .markItUpChild {
		{xen:property miu_public_dropmenu}
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent .markItUpDropMenu {
		{xen:property miu_public_buttons_drop}
	}

	/*Submenu*/
	<xen:comment>Disable => bug with this css path => need to check this later
	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent ul .markItUpDropMenu {
		background:#F5F5F5 url(styles/sedo/markitup/editor/submenu.png) no-repeat 100% 50%;
	}
	</xen:comment>

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Separator
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent .markItUpSeparator {
		{xen:property miu_public_separator}
	-xenforo-nomatch-margin: 0 2px !important;
		/*Hack IE7*/
		*display: inline;
		zoom: 1;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent .markItUpSeparator span
	{
		display: block;
		position: relative;
		left: 0;
		margin: 0 auto;
		top: -1px;
		text-indent: -10000px;
		width: 1px;
		height:{xen:property miu_public_separator.height};
	}

	/*Check if for submenu*/
	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent ul .markItUpSeparator {
		width:auto;
		height:1px;
		margin:0px;
	}

	.markItUpHeader .markItUpParent ul .markItUpSeparator span {
		visibility:hidden;
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* MiuToTinyMCE Trigger
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.miu_trigger{
		font-size: 11px;
		margin-left:2px;
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Force Css to use Xen Button Style in Miu
*********************************/</xen:comment>

	.markItUpHeader .button {
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property button}}
	}

	.markItUpHeader .button:hover {
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property buttonHover}}
	}

	.markItUpHeader .button:focus {
	{xen:helper cssImportant, {xen:property buttonFocus}}
	}

<xen:comment>/********************************
* Smilie button display
*********************************/</xen:comment>

	.markItUpHeader .miu_smilies .markItUpChild {
		{xen:property miu_public_smiliesbox}
		*height: {xen:calc '{xen:property miu_public_smiliesbox.height} + 5'}px;
	}


<xen:comment>/********************************
* TinyMCE Overlay IE8
*********************************/</xen:comment>
	.xenOverlay .mceLayoutSafe{
		min-height:260px;
		box-sizing: border-box;
	}

<xen:require css="MarkitUpIntegrator_Tools.css" />
<xen:comment> All elements inside this template will be included above the editor </xen:comment>
<xen:include template="MarkitUp_Tools_Color_Picker" />

The JS file must be loaded via jQuery -> avoid to load another 10ko script
  • {xen:phrase color}
  • {xen:phrase miu_ok}

{xen:phrase miu_insert_image}

{xen:phrase miu_enter_image_url}

{xen:phrase embed_media}

{xen:phrase enter_media_url}
{xen:phrase you_may_embed_media_from_following_sites}: {$site.site_title};

{xen:phrase insert_link}

{xen:phrase enter_link_url}
{xen:phrase miu_button_link_text}

modification.replace: <xen:if is="{$visitor.miu_rte_reverse} AND !{$editorOptions.miu.loadRte}"> <textarea id="{$editorId}_miu" rows="5" class="textCtrl MessageEditor MiuRevert MiuTarget" name="message" style="overflow: hidden;">{$message}</textarea> <xen:else /> $0 </xen:if>

modification.description: Prevent the RTE editor to load (reverse option)
modification.replace:
{xen:phrase use_rich_text_editor}
$0
